key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global raw materials
Post-pandemic demand normalization and revenue volatility
Intense competitive pressures from other packaging and delivery system providers
Stock performance concerns and investor confidence
controversies: Potential disruptions to manufacturing operations and supply chains due to geopolitical tensions
Uncertainty in sustaining growth post-COVID-19 vaccine demand surge
environmental_issues: Need to reduce carbon footprint and increase waste recycling
social_issues: Commitment to diversity and inclusion, with over 65% of C-suite comprising women, people of color, or international diversity
governance_issues: Navigating complex regulatory environments to maintain market access and profitability
